Title: The Challenger's Ring: Snow Blossom
Description:
News of your feats has been traveling around the camp, $n.

In fact, Snow Blossom would like to test your skill in battle.

You had best prepare yourself, $c. She is not easily defeated.

If you can prove your worth to her, you will win a valuable friend.
ObjectivesText: Challenge Snow Blossom and defeat her in the Challenger's Ring.
